name: Aagent.ai
description: Aagent is building the first chain abstracted non-custodial on-chain agent ecosystem capable of working across multiple blockchains and DeFi protocols. Simplifying multi-chain transactions with a unified balance and single signature interface. Let’s redefine DeFi with AI, let’s build DeFAI. Why Aagent.ai ? 1: Unified Balances: Aagent aggregates token balances into a single unified balance which can be spent on any chain. 2: One Signature Execution: Execution of multiple transactions and user intents, across multiple blockchains-with a single user signature. 3: Human Centric Design: From chaos to clarity, Speak with Aagent like you speak with a human, including voice commands. One prompt, endless opportunities. 4: Platform Agnostic: Aagent can be accessed through native web interface, telegram, discord and API.
